info.title: The Alexa Voice Service Headless Client
info.description: The Alexa Voice Service Headless Client serves as a personal assistant

smartscreenconfig.description: The path to the SmartScreenSDKConfig.json (e.g /usr/share/WPEFramework/AVS/SmartScreenSDKConfig.json). This config will be used only when SmartScreen functionality is enabled

kwdmodelspath.description: Path to the Keyword Detection models (e.g /usr/share/WPEFramework/AVS/models). The path mus contain the localeToModels.json file

loglevel.description: Capitalized log level of the AVS components. Possible values: NONE, CRITICAL, ERROR, WARN, INFO. Debug log levels start from DEBUG0 up to DEBUG0

audiosource.description: The callsign of the plugin that provides the voice audio input or PORTAUDIO, when the portaudio library should be used. (e.g BluetoothRemoteControll, PORTAUDIO)

enablesmartscreen.description: Enable the SmartScreen support in the runtime. The SmartScreen functionality must be compiled in

enablekwd.description: Enable the Keyword Detection engine in the runtime. The KWD functionality must be compiled in
